Segment.name: CS
Segment.comment: To provide information about a contract

Field.name: ChangeOrderSequenceNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned by the orderer identifying a specific change or revision to a previously transmitted transaction set

Field.name: ReleaseNumber
Field.comment: Number identifying a release against a Purchase Order previously placed by the parties involved in the transaction

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: PurchaseOrderNumber
Field.comment: Identifying number for Purchase Order assigned by the orderer/purchaser

Field.name: FOBPointCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of F.O.B. point

Field.name: TermsTypeCode1
Field.comment: Code identifying type of payment terms

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: UnitPrice
Field.comment: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc.

Field.name: TermsTypeCode2
Field.comment: Code identifying type of payment terms

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either CS04 or CS05 is present, then the other is required.
